text: Sérgio Marins (born 27 December 1969) is a Brazilian equestrian. He competed in two events at the 2004 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Brazil Category:Equestrians at the 2004 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Belo Horizonte
title: Sérgio Marins
